      public void createStudent(String name, String lastName, String password, int age, Gender gender, int phoneNumber, int year, Degree degree, Faculty faculty, String speciality)

      name - - Student's first name
      lastName - - Student's last name

      phoneNumber - - Student's phone number

      speciality - - Student's specialty
